title: Patrick Bernhard
text: Welcome! I’m a third-year PhD student studying political science at the University of California, Davis where I split my time between my position as a teaching assistant and research on international security and research methods.

title: Patrick Bernhard
text:
Education
University of California, Davis | Davis, CA PhD in Political Science | Sept 2021 - June 2026 (Expected)
Carnegie Mellon University | Pittsburgh, PA B.S in International Relations & Politics | 2020

title: Patrick Bernhard
